title: Can't Login
body: Every time I try to login, it won't let me. The worst part is that a glitch from the old client prevents me from reopening the client until I end LeagueClient.exe in my system processes. Please fix this; it takes me around 20 attempts to get in EVERY time.

replies.body: Hey PalPlays! When you try to log into LCU alpha, you get an error message? Can you describe the mesage?
No I do not. All that happens is that I hit enter and it does nothing.

Hey, sorry for the late reply - if this is still occurring, can you submit a bug report with your leagueclient and leagueclient UX logs attached to Player Support? We'll take a look and see if we can figure out whats going on.

You should be able to find your logs in the same folder league client alpha is installed, let me know if you run into  problems.
